response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth every penny of the $10,000 it offers. However, to ensure we both benefit from this transaction, I propose a price of $9,500 for the product. This price reflects my commitment to providing you with high-quality service while also allowing me to maintain a reasonable profit margin. Please let me know if this proposal works for you, and we can proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 9500}
